QuestData.Title: Equine Soul
QuestData.Description: <The Equine Soul is free-spirited and loyal. The shape of a horned horse will be yours to call upon.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Equine Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Equine Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: A majestic shape, for certain. It is now yours, should you choose to use it.
